entry.title: I made something to monitor my Raspberry Pi 3 at home.

link.title: I made something to monitor my Raspberry Pi 3 at home.

entry.content:
Context

So I had this little Raspberry Pi 3 sitting around which I bought back in 2016.
Yes I am still using it, why not?
So recently I decided to let it run something instead of biting dust at home I installed DietPi on it and use it as a real server for some thing that I would actually use everyday, being slow is okay too, itâ€™s fun innit?
Anyway, in order to see how bad CSG is doing here Iâ€™ve decided to attach a mini UPS to it, which pretty much is a block that sits underneath your Pi with two 18650 batteries connected to a MAX17041.
And what it brings is some I2C connection to my Pi for some stats to read, and with that plus A HUGE MERGER OF MY OTHER THREE PREVIOUS PROJECTS with something more blended in it, Iâ€™ve created:
SimpUPSMon - Some readings from my Raspberry Pi and itâ€™s â€œUPSâ€(sic)
Which read some status from the Pi, some status from your browser, and bangï¼
Oh and I hand wrote a basic HTTP server for this, just becauz I am lazyâ€¦

TL;DR

Go see for yourself at(and your IP address + headers): SimpUPSMonSample

Just too many trauma and I am simply broken at this point, I just wants to be here for a bit longer.

I just love to mask myself, like itâ€™s not even within my control. And I love to stay alone in order to back to normal again.

entry.title: I know I am weird.
entry.content:
Yes sure I know, and I metioned it here alot, but the fact is, I am weird.

Itâ€™s not like I want to be proud of it or sth, oh btw, like, a lot of the weird ppl like to talk about their weirdness but they are all successful dudes and I am not so I wonâ€™t.
Letâ€™s all make it clear:

It is painful to live for being weird.
Youâ€™re weird? Wonâ€™t have much friends, even you have any. And you will be prone to Ijime or Bullying.

Like at least for me I masked and learnt how to masked myself really hard, in order to keep me safe and wonâ€™t be hated by others. Heck, my mom and some at her age used to say things like â€œYou are really good at getting along with people!â€ or â€œWow [MISGENDER MESS] really knows how to keep up with the others in an new enviornment! Amazing!â€.
Hey guysâ€¦ itâ€™s hardâ€¦ and itâ€™s painful in the process, and I have to act like I am normal all the time and with all those weird thing in my mind, which I have to always look at how others did it cautiously and tring to understand why they have to think like that, itâ€™s so damn fucking hard. And in the end of course I wouldnâ€™t understand them at all or sth, and sometimes if I walked too closely with others they will just got angry with me and be like â€œWhy the fuck you canâ€™t understand all this, do something!â€(but do what really? What should I do when others angry with me, ACK my fault and apologize? I did but they didnâ€™t accept it at all). And the end results was like either they forgive about me on this and understand I canâ€™t do things like a normal one or I just walked away with no more connections with them(ofc most of the time they will be back after a few years or months butâ€¦ I am sorryâ€¦)
You know I used to thought â€œHey I know I am a bit weird but others are the same they just masked it perfectly or sthâ€ but turns out thats not the truth anyway.
Speaking of which, I canâ€™t really understand most of your feelings likeâ€¦ I canâ€™t even discribe it but just so weird you guys, like why the fuck a lot of you just suddenly wants to date with a random (I donâ€™t really know if thatâ€™s beauty or not) classmates that you just know about, for a bit, and you guys donâ€™t really talk much anyway, why? Thatâ€™s straight out lewd and disgustings but from my experience as a [OMG I HATE THIS GENDER THING] thats the normâ€¦? And I am the one thats being weird???

Besides, there are also alot of things I canâ€™t understand, like I only use English medium to gather most of the informations like news or sometimes in Japanese, and I wrote my blogs in English, and I just watch a tons of videos on YouTube thats also in English, but it seems like that itâ€™s a tall order for most of other guysâ€¦? at least for those around me.
Like they love to talk about huge effort into learning or acquiring English as a second language, and from what I can tell yes they did, and they really seems desperate on topics like this. But when I said, hey you could try my way, watch, listen and use everyday, and just read read read and read, soon you will have a huge improvements, I did that for more than 10 years now and I donâ€™t really go to some places thats speaks English. But they were all like â€œyeah sure, but I simply canâ€™t understand what theyâ€™re talking about.â€ And oh my god I told them that â€œI donâ€™t understand at first as well, but I just somehow learn it in this way and I just slowly started to understand what they were talking about like a baby growing up learning languages, and those Vids I picked are sth I am interested in anyway.â€
They said okay and went back and after that they still complains about they canâ€™t understand English and oh boy what I saw just someone greedily doomscrolling on their phone with those fucking boring and â€œmade to be funny but not actually funnyâ€ shit shorts. And at that moment I realized that theyâ€™re doommedâ€¦

Speaking of Shorts(or â€œTikToksâ€), I donâ€™t love those thingsâ€¦ everysingle time when I accidentally got trolled into a YouTube shorts or something that was only posted on shorts I just have my brain immediately spills DANGER all over and just tell me to be aware, donâ€™t scroll. And I think I donâ€™t really prefer those short vidsâ€¦ no context, not all that effort really, and not worth my timeâ€¦ and there are endless shorts waiting for you.
But on the other hand, I love scrolling Twitterâ€¦? But most of my feeds are illustrations or interesting Japanese posts, albeit my â€œloveâ€ really depends if I am in the mood or not. Oh and theres the YouTube thingâ€¦ Yeah I love documentary on tech or some demostration vids(so I donâ€™t need to buy them). And I love to rewatch all the things Iâ€™ve watch before and wait for bots to find something I might like for me.

Alright anyway, Idk, I am a bit bored just so I have a lot of things to say, and my social battery went out of batts this week so I donâ€™t feel like go to SNS and have a deep chat with friends or sth, I needs to be alone, to be happy or like to talk with others again. If some of you actually read this far down here, I apologize for all those â€œNot online in 10hrs momentâ€¦â€ I just simply donâ€™t want to, my brain is trying to stop me from doing it, I an tired. I am sorryâ€¦

And thereâ€™s the other thing I felt I am pretty weird in, when I was still aâ€¦ uuhâ€¦ normal students that not yet needed to take mental health pills, I used to admire those who does, like they had the freedom to take it, normal pals will be afraid of them since they donâ€™t want to accidentally hurt them for whatever reason(to those normal pals, thank you, but all of you are cowards afraid of deaths). But now after Iâ€™ve got most part of my brain messed up and take tons a pill a day to keep on track with my life I started thinking: This shouldnâ€™t be like this, albeit again, it does feel a bit more free, my parents are more careful towards my feelings and my thoughts, they will no longer force me or surveillance me 24*7(I will talk about more on this later, but one question for you: have you ever been required by your parents to let them check the status of your pee or the status of your shit after you take a dump in toliet? Go figure. Tho I donâ€™t really hate them that much now, I reckon they just did it like thetâ€™re crazyâ€¦) but is that itâ€¦? With the cost of they still not really want me to study abroad or even allowing me to live on my ownâ€¦ Really? Yeah gotta admit I have regrets on that, but my mental health at that point could no longer suffer soâ€¦

Ah, and thereâ€™s good old Shenzhen Museme debacle, I wonâ€™t talk about it as well, although I am in pretty stable mental states now but wonâ€™t ever try. I no longer have nightmares related to it in recent years (at least after 2023 when I realized hey I was just in the wrong place with a bunch of assholes, oh fuck I should stop talking about this, I started to remember what happenedâ€¦ FULL STOP).

So hey, howâ€™s your first full week in 2026 been? whoa time flies so fast, tho I some how feeling 2025 felt like an eternal but also notâ€¦ weirdâ€¦

I still needs to figure out something in the next few days:

  • iPod Touch or Nokia Touchscreens
    • if iPod touch that really ainâ€™t all that much fun, but hey at least it got iOS 15â€¦ wait thatâ€™s a bit too old as well.
    • if Nokia, Symbian or MeeGo/Maemo?
      • if Symbian, N8 or 808 Pureview?(I prefer the latter tbh, but N8 was my dream machine when I was a kid!)
      • if MeeGo/Maemo, N9 or N900â€¦? both seems fun
    • Only reason that I ainâ€™t buying yet: all of them HSDPA at bestâ€¦ and 3G was pretty much long gone here
  • Should I gave it a chance and study that subject I have no idea on for the finals? Or just praise for the best, like I did when dealing with French, wait no I actuallt spent some time on it.
  • The whole Concerta situationâ€¦ should I take it tmr(weekends) to write more shit or read more stuff online in front of my PC or just not take anything and go grab some sleep for a boring whole day?

Too messed up, I am way too messed upâ€¦ But whateverâ€¦

entry.content:
This is the English version of [CN] ä¸€ç‚¹äººç±»è¡Œä¸ºçš„è§‚å¯Ÿ, albeit I would reckon this is a total rewrite since I use no translator but my brain.

Okie but i am pretty tired and not motivated.

In this post I would trying to explain and comment or figuring out why on stuff Iâ€™ve notice around the school (or campus, or college, tho I reckon this is not a real college lmao), I wrote the Chinese version first since Iâ€™ve just coped through a tough ass French exam that I regret the most on choosing, why the hell I could only choose Espanol and Francais, fuck sake wheres Japaneseâ€¦?
Exams are so tiring no matter what.

Alright back to topic, so this is the English copy I promised, which is not directly translated using translator like most others do but a complete rewrite, and not a 1:1 one.

Famous quote:

I think college campuses are a great place to observe humanity.

(Thatâ€™s if you could avoid losing your humanity in the process)

Case first, then case studies

I used to mentioned on my Telegram Channel (I guess) about something I observed in a cloudy summer day.

I know you guys will just call it as Conformity et cetera[sic] or whatever, but when I check online about it itâ€™s more like Collective delusion when (at least in my POV, I am no expert on this) many people happen to in a single place and they are mostly alone not in a group with their friends or sth in that place and suddenly someone in this many people decides to do or believe on something wrong or stupid and others just follow suit without their own judgement.

So tldr:

  • It have been raining for a few days, and that day was quite cloudy. (just like days before it)
  • Some waterponds formed due to reason above.
  • And because of the cloudy weather most of the students were taking umbrella with them, incl. me.
  • But it never rained that day.
  • It happened when the first class in the afternoon just end and most were leaving the college building via the front entrance.
  • I was leaving too but the entrance were so crowdy and I am quite confused with it, so I started to observing others.

So the first thing I did when I saw some are opening the umbrella is looking at the sky but found out it wasnâ€™t raining at all, not even windy(You could tell by leaves werenâ€™t moving at all, either by rain drops or by wind), but:

Someone walked out of the building, and stopped to looking at the skies, and are opening their umbrellas.
Others noticing this did the same as well.

And the end result was most of them just stopped and did the same and now theres a little traffic jam going on.
And btw I heard someone talking to their pals said: â€œHey itâ€™s raining just put on your umbrella!â€
When I finally got out of there I realised that most of the ppl on streets were using umbrellas(other than few pals forgot to bring one, and theres me).
Me walking outta there without holding umbrella be like: ğŸ˜ Okieâ€¦
And I walked back to dorm without seeing a single drop of water on my glasses, wtf.

REAL TL;DR

I know in this case, Conformity played an important role, since when the amount of ppl around you are large enough, humanity tends to form a idea on others thinking â€œwhy this guy is weird not like usâ€ and get pressurized to do the same albeit they know this is wrong or not needed.
And I reckon that theyâ€™re not â€œI should following everything others didâ€ but more like â€œFrom others action it seems like that it is raining outsideâ€ and they could chose not to do the thing others did according to this condition.
I remembered that when I was a child(yes to some I am still are) I am always being told or scold with â€œHumans are social animals living in group.â€(â€œäººç±»æ˜¯ç¾¤ä½“åŠ¨ç‰©â€), true, but what they actually meant was â€œDonâ€™t be a weirdo.â€ instead of â€œWe all do our own different part in human society.â€
Oh speaking of which, I always think of â€œblind obedienceâ€ an important symbol of (esp. mainland Chinese) college students or those in the similar age, which thatâ€™s exactly what someones(incl. multiple group of ppl) want anyway, and some more examples:

  • No need to actually go and study in library but still went to due to their class/dormmates were all doing it(which mostly based on the same reason), and starting to panic/doubt if theyâ€™re actually okay to go on and have the final exams. But ended up Doomscrolling all day in library without doing much(which might cause more anxiety).
  • Buying tons of those â€œTrendyâ€ item online without the actuall need, purely out of using it as something to talk about with others, and/or just because everyone had one.
  • â€œEmotional Valueâ€
  • You know what? Those figurines sold in Pop Mart are ugly as fk, who the hell designed it? Total plastic waste, all those â€œtrendy itemâ€ are just yet another way to scam(which just like the one I metioned before, albeit with tons more paid advertisers claiming or not claiming therâ€™re paid to praise).
  • Things I did: I just simply wait for others to submit their class performance score to figure out how much of a score I should fill in order to be â€œthe averageâ€ for my own good. (I know.)

Closing

I know after I wrote about all this there are surely some idiots pointing fingers at me and shout â€œWe all knew it haha, youâ€™re such an idiot for saying it out loud like nobody knew it lmaoâ€ or â€œWho the fuck you think you are?â€ etc.
I know, thatâ€™s what most of you guys are thinking right now, since I always get scold like this ever since my childhood, but itâ€™s fine, all I want to say is:

At least I talked about it out loud unlike you guys, what you said just classic Conformity.

Speaking of which, why the filename/hyperlink of this post (both in English or in Chinese) were related to the word â€œmotivatedâ€:

Same thing but on Apple Musicï¼š

^ Which sums up my Exam Week perfectly: â€œWhatever.â€, not motivated anyway (With the added confidence boosted by the fact that I am in â€œEnglish majorâ€ but brought an IELTS 8.0 with me, and now I donâ€™t worry about anything lol, most of them at least, other than stuff like French, Omg I hate French the language, not the Frenchâ€¦)
